--- In gladiator@y..., "Deathifier" <storey@t...> wrote:
> Congratulations, 50 scenarios is quite an achievement!
> 
> I wonder if any future versions of gladiator would be able to import 
them?
> Most games don't allow it for technical reasons although G:BF 
doesn't look a
> lot different :)

That's why I wanted the 50 project.
 
> I'll have a run through them in the near future, though my cleric 
isn't
> legit (actually I have no idea what it is, but thats what popped up 
as the
> 'current team' when I ran the game last) :)>

Fortunately, I have a legitimate team.  Only 1 problem I have is its 
composition: 1 mage, 1 archmage, and 2 clerics.  Admittedly, I will be 
curious as heck to find out what final stats on that team will be 
after I send through the rest of my scenarios.  I do give you some 
good news: the last two scenarios aren't . . that difficult.  I know a 
100% legitimate team can beat those two.

No, I don't want to do a follow-up to those scenarios nor do I want 
anyone else to do a follow-up.  I am concerned about crashing the game 
if anyone did a proper follow-up [opponents would have to be at least 
exp level 20-25 to equal how I brought most characters].  Until the 
game gets modified a lot to handle really high stats,  we shouldn't 
have legitimate teams composed of characters who are at experience 
level 100+.
